name: setVariablesLogMetrics
policy_content:
<!-- this policy allows us to execute java script code during execution of an API Proxy -->
<Javascript async="false" continueOnError="true" enabled="true" timeLimit="200" xmlns='http://www.sap.com/apimgmt'>
	<ResourceURL>jsc://setVariablesLogMetrics.js</ResourceURL>
</Javascript>
